sys_script.name: To populate equipment type dynamically

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_72510bc4db289c1067166ac2ca961995
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>false</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>x_inmis_im_itad_imitad_hardware</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>To populate equipment type dynamically</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {

	// Add your code here

	var gr = new GlideRecord("x_inmis_im_itad_im_mapping_model_equipment");
	gr.addEncodedQuery('mapping_model_categoriesLIKE'+current.hardware_assets.model_category);
	gr.query();
if (gr.next()) {
   current.im_itad_equipment_type = gr.sys_id;
	
}


})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>INVOLR00</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2020-04-28 18:01:23</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>72510bc4db289c1067166ac2ca961995</sys_id><sys_mod_count>4</sys_mod_count><sys_name>To populate equipment type dynamically</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Ingram Micro IT Asset Disposition" source="x_inmis_im_itad">df95bbf0dbc17f008a521fe968961950</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Ingram Micro IT Asset Disposition">df95bbf0dbc17f008a521fe968961950</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_72510bc4db289c1067166ac2ca961995</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>INVOLR00</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2020-05-20 08:37:29</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=72510bc4db289c1067166ac2ca961995"/></record_update>
